Text.Name: Ginseng
Text.Desc: Rare medicinal material. Has powerful healing ability and can greatly increase your primeval พลังชี่. Grows in an environment between -30 to 40℃. Only grows in places with a certain amount of พลังชี่.

Text.Name: GanodermaLucidum
Text.ThingName: เห็ดหลินจือ
Text.Desc: Rare medicinal material. Has powerful healing ability and can greatly increase your primeval พลังชี่. Grows in an environment between 10 to 40℃. Only grows in places with a certain amount of พลังชี่.

Text.Name: Mint
Text.Desc: Common medicinal material. Cold in nature, it has a soothing and calming effect. Grows in an environment between -30 to 40℃. Only grows in places with a certain amount of พลังชี่.

Text.Name: MagicHerb
Text.Desc: Medicinal material with spirituality. Supposed to be relatively rare. Grows in an environment between -30 to 40℃. Only grows in places with a certain amount of พลังชี่. There are Spirit Leaves growing everywhere outside the Cave Mansion at Alchemist's Peak in Central Plains.

Text.Name: WarmHerb
Text.Desc: Herb with a variety of appearances that only matures in winter and summer. Also known as "shapeshifting grass" among common people. When consumed, it can temporarily improve one's adaptability to extreme environment.
Text.StoryBnts.0.Name: Harvest
